p.k: Tim Burton's fantasy drama stars Johnny Depp as a young man who, created but not completed by his inventor (Vincent Price), is left with shears for hands
Animated adventure. There are unexpected consequences when a blue-skinned, large-headed alien supervillain outwits and defeats his superhero enemy
Oscar-nominated animation. The young Viking Hiccup and his friend Astrid inhabit a village that lives in fear of fire-breathing dragons
Comedy starring Lucas Till and Rob Lowe. A car-obsessed teenager attempts to save three strange creatures after an oil company accidentally frees
Family sci-fi adventure starring Ben Winchell. A 16-year-old is shocked to discover that he can emit increasingly powerful energy from his fingers
Action-thriller. Dominic Cooper stars as a Special Boat Service officer who is tasked with tracking down stolen WMDs and preventing a terrorist attack
Outrageous comedy starring Jason Statham as a hitman with an artificial heart that requires regular electrical kick-starts. Violence/strong, offensive
Larry Clark's drama stars Brad Renfro and Rachel Milner as teens who plan violent revenge on a bully (Nick Stahl). Adults only: very strong
